snippet: THL Partners agreed on Monday to buy CompuCom Systems, a privately held information technology consultancy. The deal values CompuCom at about $1.1 billion, according to a person briefed on the matter.
abstract: THL Partners agreed on Monday to buy CompuCom Systems, a privately held information technology consultancy. The deal values CompuCom at about $1.1 billion, according to a person briefed on the matter.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: THL to Buy CompuCom, a Technology Services Firm
